functionDecorators.name: calculateSwap
functionDecorators.description: Calculate amount of tokens you receive on swap.

parameterDecorators.name: tokenIndexFrom
parameterDecorators.description: the token the user wants to sell.

parameterDecorators.name: tokenIndexTo
parameterDecorators.description: the token the user wants to buy.

parameterDecorators.name: dx
parameterDecorators.description: the amount of tokens the user wants to sell. If the token charges a fee on transfers, use the amount that gets transferred after the fee.

returnDecorators.description: amount of tokens the user will receive.

parameterDecorators.name: to
parameterDecorators.description: address on other chain to redeem underlying assets to.

parameterDecorators.name: chainId
parameterDecorators.description: which underlying chain to bridge assets onto.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: ERC20 compatible token to deposit into the bridge.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: Amount in native token decimals to transfer cross-chain pre-fees*.

functionDecorators.name: redeemAndRemove
functionDecorators.description: Wraps redeemAndRemove on SynapseBridge Relays to nodes that (typically) a wrapped synAsset ERC20 token has been burned and the underlying needs to be redeeemed on the native chain. This function indicates to the nodes that they should attempt to redeem the LP token for the underlying assets (E.g "swap" out of the LP token).

parameterDecorators.name: to
parameterDecorators.description: address on other chain to redeem underlying assets to.

parameterDecorators.name: chainId
parameterDecorators.description: which underlying chain to bridge assets onto.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: ERC20 compatible token to deposit into the bridge.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: Amount of (typically) LP token to pass to the nodes to attempt to removeLiquidity() with to redeem for the underlying assets of the LP token.

parameterDecorators.name: liqTokenIndex
parameterDecorators.description: Specifies which of the underlying LP assets the nodes should attempt to redeem for.

parameterDecorators.name: liqMinAmount
parameterDecorators.description: Specifies the minimum amount of the underlying asset needed for the nodes to execute the redeem/swap.

parameterDecorators.name: liqDeadline
parameterDecorators.description: Specificies the deadline that the nodes are allowed to try to redeem/swap the LP token*.

functionDecorators.name: redeemAndSwap
functionDecorators.description: Wraps redeemAndSwap on SynapseBridge.sol Relays to nodes that (typically) a wrapped synAsset ERC20 token has been burned and the underlying needs to be redeeemed on the native chain. This function indicates to the nodes that they should attempt to redeem the LP token for the underlying assets (E.g "swap" out of the LP token).

parameterDecorators.name: to
parameterDecorators.description: address on other chain to redeem underlying assets to.

parameterDecorators.name: chainId
parameterDecorators.description: which underlying chain to bridge assets onto.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: ERC20 compatible token to deposit into the bridge.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: Amount in native token decimals to transfer cross-chain pre-fees.

parameterDecorators.name: tokenIndexFrom
parameterDecorators.description: the token the user wants to swap from.

parameterDecorators.name: tokenIndexTo
parameterDecorators.description: the token the user wants to swap to.

parameterDecorators.name: minDy
parameterDecorators.description: the min amount the user would like to receive, or revert to only minting the SynERC20 token crosschain.

parameterDecorators.name: deadline
parameterDecorators.description: latest timestamp to accept this transaction*.
